findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function rebase() uses a loop to rebase the contract by time and will be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long time without rebase.

findings.title: Rounding errors
findings.description: At some calculation with division, it goes first. In Solidity we don’t have floating points, but instead we get rounding errors.

findings.title: No event on basic transfer
findings.description: The function _basicTransfer() do not emit transferring event.
